CustomField.description: How index increase is measured: simple division - normal, percentage increase, compared with a fixed base year - base, if none of those applies - other.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Descrbes how the increase of the indices is measured. Normal: Measures increase as the division of the latest index to the previous index. Percentage: Measures the increase in percentage terms. Base years: Compares the value of latest index to a constant.
CustomField.label: Index type
